other_tests.findings: The liver is homogeneous in echotexture, except for presence of two cysts in the left lobe, both subcentimeter in size. There is mild intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation, and the common bile duct is significantly dilated measuring up to 10 mm. The gallbladder is distended with mild gallbladder wall edema demonstrated, no gallstones are seen.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Gallbladder wall edema and distention unchanged since prior CT. Mild intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation and common bile duct dilation noted.
